MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY4 and KY5 postcode areas of Cowdenbeath and Lochgelly. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:29pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7AM via generators. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.41AM on 16th February 2021.
